 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָאַר‎</span>] **verb** (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***excite hostility, irritate***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***break open***, of a wound); — 

**Hiph\`il** ==prick, pain== ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַמְאִיר‎</span> [[Ezek.28.24|Ezek 28:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַמְאֶ֫רֶת‎</span> [[Lev.13.51|Lev 13:51]] + 2 t.; — of thorn <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִלּוֺן מ‎</span> [[Ezek.28.24|Ezek 28:24]] (figurative of oppressors of Israel,); \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺץ מַכְאִב‎</span>); elsewhere of leprosy (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרַעַת‎</span>) = ***malignant*** ? [[Lev.13.51|Lev 13:51]]; [[Lev.13.52|Lev 13:52]]; [[Lev.14.44|Lev 14:44]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]; but [[BDB#Sam|⅏]] in all these has <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרראת‎</span>, √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרא‎</span> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרה‎</span> ***be obstinate***, compare [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]<sup>816b</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di]]). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַאֲרָב‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארב‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְאֵרָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארר‎</span>. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִבְדָּלָה‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִבְדָּלוֺת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בדל‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָבוֺא‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בוא‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְבוּכָה‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בוך‎</span>.
